mutants.original_line: parcolor = None if par is None else colors[par, node]
mutants.mutated_line: parcolor = None if par is not None else colors[par, node]

mutants.original_line: colors[node, neigh] = 0 if parcolor is None else parcolor
mutants.mutated_line: colors[node, neigh] = 0 if parcolor is not None else parcolor

mutants.original_line: colors[node, neigh] = 0 if parcolor is None else parcolor
mutants.mutated_line: colors[node, neigh] = 1 if parcolor is None else parcolor

mutants.original_line: colors[node, neigh] = 0 if parcolor is None else parcolor
mutants.mutated_line: colors[node, neigh] = -1 if parcolor is None else parcolor

mutants.mutated_line: colors[node, neigh] = 1 if parcolor is None else parcolor
